column2: ## Reduce data size to capture most important variables
separate_wider_delim(., cols = date, delim = "-", names = c("year", "month", "day")) %>%
subset(., select = c(Site, richness, iucn_rich, locality_rich, logsppAbun, logsiteAbun, nPos_all, nNeg_all, temp_d, sMoist_d, bio1_wc, bio12_wc))
